definition: to destroy/to spoil/to ruin/to injure/cruel/oppressive/savage/brutal/incomplete/disabled/to remain/to survive/remnant/surplus

sentences.english: The intruders' tyrannical behavior led the local people to revolt.
sentences.chinese: 略者的殘虐的行徑，激起了當地民衆的反抗。

sentences.english: Building a POW camp in a place like this is an atrocity in itself.
sentences.chinese: 在這種地方建造戰俘收容所本身就是一種殘虐。
